attributes.action: Amend the Wildlife & Countryside Act 1981 to include culling of Seagulls
attributes.additional_details:
Action
Include in commercial planning application and urban development plans the following: 
•	Mandatory egg and nest removal during the nesting season
•	Gull proofing to include netting, spiking or a bird gel
•	Audio distress broadcasts
•	The use of a laser deterrent and 
•	Include in the Prevention of Damage by Pests Act 1949 action to control seagull population.
attributes.background:
Common gull problems:
•	Excessive Gull noise in Summer
•	Rooftop nesting attracts parasites
•	Gulls attack people, are known to swoop at children to steal food
•	Excess Gull guano is a health risk, on lawns, patios, ventilation systems
•	Damage caused by acidic nature of seagull guano

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar to the one which you submitted:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/160825

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/163266
